original_text: and ran about the whole region and began to bring the sick people on their beds to wherever they heard he was.
korean_text: 그 온 지방으로 달려 돌아 다니며 예수께서 어디 계시다는 말을 듣는 대로 병든 자를 침상째로 메고 나아오니

sentences.original_text: and ran about the whole region
and began to bring the sick people on their beds
to wherever they heard he was.
